SEARCH
Package lighting

Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
lighting.Light
lighting.PointLight
lighting.SpotLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
public class SpotLight extends PointLight
The SpotLight class represents a spotlight source in a scene. A spotlight is a type of point light that emits light in a specific direction. The intensity of the light is attenuated based on the direction of the spotlight.

      Constructs a spotlight with the specified intensity, position, and direction.

      position - the position of the light source
      direction - the direction in which the spotlight is pointing
